label: What sex were you assigned at birth?
How would you describe your current gender identity?
value_constraints: Male;Female;Transgender Woman (Male-to-Female);Transgender Man (Female-to-Male);Genderqueer;Another Gender Identity;Decline to state

label: What gender identity do you identify with? (Optional)
What is your racial background? CHECK ALL THAT APPLY.
value_constraints: Black or African American;White;Asian (including South Asian and Asian Indian);Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander;American Indian or Alaska Native;Some other race;Don't know

label: What is your Pacific Island background?
value_constraints: Native Hawaiian;Samoan;Guamanian or Chamorro;Other Pacific Islander or Mix

label: Are you of Hispanic, Latino or Spanish origin or ancestry?
value_constraints: No;Yes: Mexican, Mexican American or Chicano;Yes: Puerto Rican;Yes: Cuban;Yes: Other or Mixed Hispanic, Latino or Spanish origin;Don't know;Prefer not to state

label: Where would you place yourself on this ladder?
What is the highest level of education you have achieved?
value_constraints: No formal schooling;Some school, but did not graduate high school;High school diploma or equivalency (e.g., GED);Associate degree (e.g., junior college);Some college, but did not graduate college;Bachelor's degree;Master's degree;Doctorate (PhD);Professional doctorate (MD, JD, DDS, etc.);Other;Don't know;Prefer not to state
